attributes.action: Reduce Police Paperwork in order for them to do their Job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'am asking You Prime Minister Brown to drasticly reduce the large amount of paperwork that all UK Police Forces have to deal with, this high amount of paperwork is stopping real police officers from doing their jobs on the streets where they belong and not trapped in the police station filling out a mountains of paperwork which takes up most of their shift hours.
